publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1301.2 Miss Annabel Goldie: Rates Relief for Small Businesses-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1301) in the name of Mr Kenneth Gibson, leave out from "permanent" to end and insert "uniform business rate be re-instated and that efforts be made to reduce the level of uniform business rate, thereby diminishing the financial burden on all business and stimulating business activity in Scotland."
